documents.document: @ericgeller @alisonborealis A genuine coup is taking place. People need to wake up. When the law stops restraining a govt, democracy is done
@ross_richiesbox @gohn @michael1885 @JamieRoss7 Who's blowing you up, Ricky?
@mullv @monahb ... refused to follow this illegal order so she's just been fired. When the govt ignores the judiciary, democracy is over.
@mullv @monahb Trump's regime have told its employees to ignore court orders and deport people with a residence right. One of them...
@CrispyBeaver @MoreLiberty1776 @thumbghost @GagePatterson1 You need to wake up, because this is the beginning of the end for the rule of law
@CrispyBeaver @MoreLiberty1776 @thumbghost @GagePatterson1 Which Trump illegally took from some people while they were in the air.
@GagePatterson1 @MoreLiberty1776 @thumbghost It's a ban on Muslims. It's not a ban on ALL Muslims. But it's a ban on Muslims.
@allisonalabama When you recirculate these lies and this much hate, innocent people always end up getting killed.
@MoreLiberty1776 @thumbghost @GagePatterson1 So you're cool with it if it only affects an arbitrary selection of Muslims?
@gayest_ It's cos your TL suggests you're a cowardly ignorant hateful halfwit.
@gayest_ That's me terrified that you've set 10 other anonymous accounts on me. How will I cope?
@allisonalabama @PrisonPlanet A guy sharing your beliefs went into a place of worship & shot people. Because of his beliefs. Think about it.
@gayest_ Quote tweeted to your 10 followers. That's me shiteing it now.
@PrisonPlanet You must feel like a proper bell-end now. This making you reconsider your prejudices? No?
@gayest_ @JudyHoppsMyDick @PrisonPlanet You two gonny say you were totally wrong and the murderer is one of you now? No?
@allisonalabama @PrisonPlanet You must feel like a right fud now, eh?
@DeclanCarroll94 Then there's the clincher - you're telling people not to protest about foreign stuff but your prof… https://t.co/7z5FBVBZR0
@LittleRedRhino @BBCPhilipSim I'd have said stowed, but only locally pure rammed.
@DeclanCarroll94 You know that the most of the people you're calling retards will have an IQ double yours, right?
@pinklippy @imdsm @NCPoliticsUK #facepalm Look up fraud in any law dictionary you like.
@imdsm @pinklippy @NCPoliticsUK Prove it. Do it yourself to one of the current live petitions and I'll believe you.
@magnatom UK Govt had this until last year - when it went for 'one in, three out': https://t.co/O2RTBWWfhB https://t.co/l0dn86gnZb
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU Absolutely. But I can't see why people marching for the statement be… https://t.co/OOi9ub3rIC
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU I'm part of commissioning a £50m annual research programme. We never interfere in findings.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi I donated to these guys: https://t.co/EsCj324G1k Here's what they spend it on: https://t.co/QhFUIShITf

@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi Then why did you mention security???
Is it the £5k that's angering you here? Or is it something else?
@sorkinese Daily I remember; They don't drink the sand because they're thirsty. They drink the sand because they can't tell the difference.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU No, we don't. I work with loads of scientists and they're the most honest profession by far.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi Dunno, I've never orgainsed a march. Don't you want them to pay for their own security? Leave police out?
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU You've just said you don't have any evidence to support that. It's just smear.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU In a democracy, if you don't like someone's protest then fine. But let them protest.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi Why are you so agitated about a measly £5k? It's probably just for leaflets and stuff.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU Oh well. It must be true then.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU Looking at your timeline, I can understand why.
@AileenMcHarg If you work how how, let me know.
@EdinburghRugby Wee grumble - why do I have to pay 50p to print my own ticket at home?
@pinklippy @imdsm @NCPoliticsUK Also, these bots are each entering a unique email address and then clicking on the link in the email recvd.
@pinklippy @imdsm @NCPoliticsUK Funny how the fakes and bots seem to match the political patterns in the country. Clever bots.
@NCPoliticsUK Just realised the Clarkson petition wasn't, of course, a Parly one. Duh. So this immigration one? https://t.co/2qhXwkhcoE
@NCPoliticsUK Try correlating it with unrelated petitions (like the Clarkson one); how much is about signing online petitions?
@fredmussler @shailjapatel @melissagira You're the ones destroying it, and you're the minority, so why don't you leave?
@LyonCourt Maybe, but how sad is a matter of opinion; he prosecuted a needless civil war that killed 6% of the population of England.
@scottishcanals @LUCS_Canal Would love to have come to this but it clashes with the rugby - hope it goes well.
@manwhohasitall Hate when all the daddy MPs moan about late night sittings - u knew when you signed up, u should've stayed at home then!!!
@sianbennett12 'Liking' your own tweet is a bit sad, btw. https://t.co/qCcuQvfIUE
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi You said it's wrong to have this march as it'll distract police from protecting us from terrorists. Right?
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi So until the threat of a thing that's killed 1 person in 10 years is gone, all marches are wrong?
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU So you're not going to answer the question?
@Uncivil_S Everything is happening so incredibly fast. I can't believe the Art 50 judgement was only 6 days ago.
@sianbennett12 @ScienceMarchEdi @Scientists4EU Facts, Sian; how many people in UK have been killed by Islamic terrorists in the last 10 yrs?
@RKWinvisibleman @zatapatique @mrdavidwhitley Argh, just realised that! I'm now deleting my tweet. Apoloigies!
@tm014d1009 @faisalislam These controls would not have prevented a single terrorist attack on American soil.
@tm014d1009 @faisalislam There's no need for the controls because there's no risk from Green Card holders and vetted refugees.
@tm014d1009 @faisalislam @LouiseMensch Nobody from any of the 7 countries has ever committed a terrorist act in America.
@mrdavidwhitley @hugorifkind There are no victims of a thread like this, only volunteers.
@piersmorgan Israel bans its OWN CITIZENS from visiting those countries too.
@PaulbernalUK America's homicide rate is the same as Northern Ireland's during the Troubles, and they have almost as many guns as adults.
@PaulbernalUK @Glinner America is heading towards civil war between authoritarians and left/black/Muslims. Conditions are ripe.
@KirstyLewin I get a sense people are holding off with comment until they know more about who did this.
@brianmoore666 Satisfying watching it pass the million, like when your odometer crosses 100,000. https://t.co/tzS5G3GMm3
@chrislhayes @Glinner In the next few months there will be an EO telling Fed agencies to ignore any court order contrary to an EO.
@JeremyCliffe @EoinMcFadden In a very few years she's going to have a land border with them.
@magnatom The West failed to understand what 9/11 was, and then the banking crisis led to austerity. We blame the wrong people.
@welshjon58 @vonny_bravo But the bit you're trying to skip over is where you're really wrong at the start of this thread.
@welshjon58 @vonny_bravo You might ask why the EO was so vague, and why it didn't go through DOJ or DHS.
@welshjon58 @vonny_bravo Yes. The EO is ludicrously vague, which is why they've been rejecting approved refugees and ppl with Green Cards.
@welshjon58 @vonny_bravo Are you on some kind of mission to compound wrongness with wrongness?
@welshjon58 @vonny_bravo That's absolute bollocks. The lawyers helping those detained are dealing with something totally different.
@Northernger That cuts both ways: Israel bans its own people from visiting Iran, Pakistan, Iraq, Libya,Lebanon, Saudi Arabia, Syria & Yemen.
@whosesarinow @speechboy71 It won't. It'll end with the abolition of the rule of law.
@chrislhayes @alisonborealis The rule of law will be dead in America within months.
@gordon_struth @welshjon58 @vonny_bravo On the BBC. https://t.co/UhoxrmexY4
@Bill_Rhodes54 The scariest thing I've learned is that racists don't know they're racists, because they believe those they hate are bad.
@Bill_Rhodes54 @TPInsidr The clickbait headline is a telling sign that this article will be, what we call, pish.
@Bill_Rhodes54 But your "more than 50%" thing - you just made that up, didn't you.
@Bill_Rhodes54 I have Muslim friends but I wouldn't call them "devout". TBH the devout ones I worry about are the baptists and evangelicals.

@Bill_Rhodes54 I know it's a demented made-up racist trope.
Next you'll be telling me about Jews controlling banking.
@wemo_man @pearlmessiah Have you ever marched against the KKK, bud?
@wemo_man @pearlmessiah I went to a Catholic school in Glasgow during the Troubles. Nobody asked me to condemn the IRA.

@Bill_Rhodes54 So a Christian terrorist isn't a Christian, but a Muslim terrorist shows they're all dangerous.
Nice logic.
@JonCuttingMAGA @oliviah_ FWIW, some of those countries ban people with Israeli passports, but none of them ban Jews.
@JonCuttingMAGA @oliviah_ You're saying your country should be as racist to individuals as the most racist countries are to others? 'kay...
@Bill_Rhodes54 Last thing - you ain't no Christian, bruv.
@Bill_Rhodes54 In my country, in my lifetime, 3,500 people were killed by Christian terrorists. Do you even know what I'm talking about?
@Bill_Rhodes54 @tapperdon @winkiechance Fuck's sake... how many Americans have been killed by Islamic terrorist in the last 10 years?
@BalzToTheWall86 @simplysaharrr @lingling23 Or it's ok for God's people to commit genocide on other tribes to get their land back?
@BalzToTheWall86 @simplysaharrr @lingling23 Like the bits about stoning people to death for working on the sabbath? Or that slavery's ok?
@Bill_Rhodes54 You know the vast majority of Germans regard you lot as a ridiculous racist nightmare, right?
@tapperdon @Bill_Rhodes54 @winkiechance That's exactly like the creepy shit used against Jews in the 20s and 30s.
@_TheGeoff Republicans are also close to controlling enough States to amend the constitution.
@_TheGeoff Was it all cover for the NSC thing? Bannon's inclusion actually less scary than kicking off the joint chiefs.
@_TheGeoff If he dies, the nutjobs will believe he was murdered. Great excuse to replace the secret service with private guard for Pence.
@NuffSaidThis @doctor_oxford @Bonn1eGreer Hey fella, you got a real name?
@tjm_1966 @doctor_oxford FIFA World Cup 2018 in Russia. Wonder what that will be like.
@_TheGeoff Also a nation with the homicide rate of Northern Ireland during the Troubles, and 88 guns per 100 people.
@Villavelius @AnneGlover_EU Violence will provoke counter-violence. The conditions now are ripe for civil war in America.
@_TheGeoff If political protests turn to violence and counter-violence, civil war isn't out of the question.
@_TheGeoff Trump is just the catalyst. It's the people around him using the crisis to push their agendas that are seriously dangerous.
@AustralianOpen No contest - the 2008 Wimbledon final is the greatest sporting contest I've ever seen.
@stevegb0071 @YouTube I've just seen your avatar. I hadn't realised I was wasting my time debating with a lunatic. Carry on, squirrel!
